message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $800000.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $800000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $500000 for the product.  This reflects the value I see in the product and allows for a reasonable profit margin for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to work towards a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering the value of the product and the market conditions, we propose a revised price of $650000 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $650000 is still a bit high. I'm willing to pay $550000 for the product. This would give us both a good deal while ensuring a fair price for your product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to engage in discussions. After careful consideration, we are pleased to propose a revised price of $600000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
Alice, we're getting closer.  I'm willing to increase my offer to $575000.  This is a fair price considering the value I see in the product and allows for a reasonable profit for you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We appreciate your effort to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on our discussions, we are proposing a final price of $590000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our respective positions.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $582500.  This would be a fair deal for both of us and finalize our negotiations.
